page.title: 08FARMING. TYPES AND SIZES
page.content:
{Lower Lovetts Farm}, in Knowl Hill ,is owned by Mr.A.J. Nutt.It is a small { {dairy}farm of only 24 acres.It has a herd of{Guernseys}. { Mr.& Mrs Nutt}work together to milk the cows, bottle the milk on the premises and then deliver it to people in the area.{ { {Endalls Farm }at Hare Hatch has {67 acres and is a beef farm.{ { {Halls farm}, Waltham St Lawrence, has {80}hectares and is a{mixed farm }. {Frogmore farm}has {350 }acres and is an {arable farm }.
The use of more machinery has reduced the number of farm workers needed. Most of the farmers have been farming for many years. One was 5 when he first drove a tractor.
